General.Name: A-Zenith Home Furnishings Co Ltd
General.Description: A-Zenith Home Furnishings Co., Ltd. provides furniture products in China. The company offers living, dining, study, and bedroom, as well as decorative furniture products. It also offers aluminum-wood doors and windows, stair handrails, and house decoration materials. The company was formerly known as A-Zenith Furniture Co., Ltd. and changed its name to A-Zenith Home Furnishings Co., Ltd. in April 2017. A-Zenith Home Furnishings Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Nantong, China.
